body: {"query":"query PriceLookup($merchantFilter: MerchantInput, $productsFilter: ProductInput) {  merchants(filterBy: $merchantFilter) {    name    products(filterBy: $productsFilter) {      id      name      price    }  }}","variables":{"merchantFilter":{"name":{"matches":"Costco"}},"productsFilter":{"category":{"startsWith":"Produce"},"name":{"startsWith":"Banana"}}}}
